name: Symbiosis (itch) (Maisth)
description:
Symbiosis is a 3D Stealth game with Isometric view, where you control a parasite which has been used for experimentation in a laboratory located in space. You're weak, indefensible, has no means to attack, basically useless. But thanks to the experiments done to you, an ability has been born. To Control people.

The stealth element is no longer about getting past enemies undetected, but getting past them right by their noses. Thanks to the control ability, you must use this tool to get past enemies and interact with the environment so you can escape the place.

Along the game you will encounter skills that will be useful to you, such as Invisibility, Dash, etc. Make use of all this to achieve your goal!

Additional Credits:

Music by Funk Tribu
